title: Impeachment Hearing Update
itunes:title: Impeachment Hearing Update
description:
Kevin spoke with Adam Hodge, Ariel Investments Senior Vice President, and Brian Darling former Senior Communications Director for Sen. Rand Paul and Founder of Liberty Government Affairs.

The House Intelligence Committee held its second public hearing today to hear testimony by former U.S. Ambassador to Ukraine Marie Yovanovitch, who was removed from that post in May by President Donald Trump.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
